variations.description: Generates 1 Order Energy and heals all allies for 258% of ATK. Also increases all allies' ATK by 15% for 10s.
Generates 1 Order Energy and heals all allies for 301% of ATK. Also increases all allies' ATK by 15% for 10s.
Generates 1 Order Energy and heals all allies for 344% of ATK. Also increases all allies' ATK by 15% for 10s.
Generates 1 Order Energy and heals all allies for 387% of ATK. Also increases all allies' ATK by 15% for 10s.
Generates 1 Order Energy and heals all allies for 430% of ATK. Also increases all allies' ATK by 15% for 10s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 270% of ATK to all enemies and increases their Magic DMG taken by 30% for 10s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 315% of ATK to all enemies and increases their Magic DMG taken by 30% for 10s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 360% of ATK to all enemies and increases their Magic DMG taken by 30% for 10s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 405% of ATK to all enemies and increases their Magic DMG taken by 30% for 10s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 450% of ATK to all enemies and increases their Magic DMG taken by 30% for 10s.
Increases all allies' damage dealt by 10% for 5s. Can stack up to 20%.
Increases all allies' damage dealt by 20% for 5s. Can stack up to 40%.
